articles.author: KAREN LEMA, Reuters
articles.title: Martial Law victims angry as Marcos’s son closes in on presidency - GMA News Online
articles.description: Bongbong Marcos has benefited from what some political analysts describe as a decades-long public relations effort to alter perceptions of his family, accused of living lavishly at the helm of one of Asia's most notorious kleptocracies.
articles.content: Former political prisoner Cristina Bawagan still has the dress she wore the day she was arrested, tortured and sexually abused by soldiers during the late dictator Ferdinand Marcos's brutal era of ma… [+4539 chars]

articles.title: Popular old-school bakery L.W. Cake Shop has quietly closed, will be missed for their buttercream cakes - AsiaOne
articles.description: If you live in Bedok, chances are you've heard of L.W. Cake Shop, which is hugely popular for its old school buttercream cakes. Unfortunately for all the foodies out there, the bakery, which is located near Block 85 Fengshan Hawker Centre, quietly closed down…

articles.title: Nude man on motorbike ordered to undergo treatment in lieu of jail time - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A man who was found naked in public places and spotted riding a motorcycle in the nude was on Thursday (May 5) given a mandatory treatment order for two years.

articles.title: SGX Nifty rises 150 points; here's what changed for markets while you were sleeping - Economic Times
articles.description: Major Asian stocks started Thursday with a healthy advance after the Federal Reserve lifted interest rates but played down any chance of a huge 75 basis-point lift in the near future. MSCI's index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan was up by 1.08 per cent.

articles.title: Tearful Amber Heard testifies ex-husband Johnny Depp turned violent - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actress told a Virginia jury that Depp physically abused her multiple times, starting when he slapped her after she laughed at the writing on one of his tattoos.

articles.description: Footage circulating on social media showed a man charging on to the stage and tackling Chappelle as he was performing at the Hollywood Bowl during the Netflix Is A Joke festival.
